result.title: Floyd-Warshall â€” sample code O(N^3)
result.content:
for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) 
  for (int j=1;j<=n;j++) 
    if (i==j) d[i][j]=0; else d[i][j]=INF; 

for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++) 
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) 
    for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) 
       d[i][j] = min(d[i][j],d[i][k]+d[k][j]);

2-for va 3- for da qatnashgan o`zgaruvchini ya`ni i va j ni d[i][j] sini o`zgartiramiz
